nodes.text: Ardon was a Human male commander who served the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War as one of Balmorran resistance leader. He was stationed in the Farnel Outpost Command Center on Balmorra. He was a liaison officer between the resistance and Republic, though he disliked the galactic government for abandoning Balmorra citizens during Great Galactic War. In spite of his dissatisfaction he played a crucial role in recruiting an demolitions expert named Tanno Vik into Havoc Squad.
